Connect with a Doctor

Instant access to live doctors and AI-powered assistance

Live Doctor Chat

If a doctor is available, you will be connected instantly for a live chat session. If all doctors are currently busy, you will be placed in a queue. Your estimated wait time will be displayed.

No doctors available? You will be placed in queue.

AI Chatbot Doctor

Need urgent help? Our AI chatbot doctor is available 24/7 to provide immediate medical advice and support.

How It Works

  • If a doctor is available, you will be connected immediately.
  • If no doctors are online, your position in the queue will be updated in real-time.
  • The AI chatbot doctor is always available for urgent queries.
